changes: Added palette importing
Added rotate tools to tile editor
Added grid hotkey (ctrl + ')
Added screen sized gridlines to tilemap editor if the screen size is divisible by the tile size
Colors added from the color picker are now inserted into the palette after the active color instead of the last color
Added Gamepad support
Add alternate keyboard buttons
Added Game descriptions and controls instructions
Swapped Menu Confirm and Menu Back keyboard defaults
Changed how audio volume works to better account for human hearing. This will make existing audio volumes quieter.
Added onDrawTile parameter function to Screen.drawMap. This allows state changes and animations when drawing a map.
Added Screen.drawMapArray to draw an array of tile gid values
Added TileMap.getLayerData to get an array of tile gid values from a TileMaps layer
Engine.onInit is now called afer all engine initialization is done
Added Engine.onConfigure to configure the engine before initialization is done
Updated logo and color theme
Added feed to Bitmelo.com
You can now have up to 16 scripts. They are executed in order.
Added screen.drawTileSection to the engine
Added screen.drawArray to the engine
Added tileData.getTileSection to the engine
Publishing now generates a cover image
Fixed bug with playing a sound with exponential release causing crash
Added line tool to tile editor.
Added PNG export to tile editor
Added find to code editor
If an individual frame or game init lasts longer than 5 seconds the game will now crash. This is to prevent an infinite loop from locking up the browser forever.
Added backquote (`) hotkey to toggle panels in the tile and tilemap editors.
Added cloud saves
You can now publish games on bitmelo.com
max number of sounds is now 128
Added projects view for cloud projects
You can now create up to 8 tilesets
Added Select All, Flip Vertical, and Flip Horizontal buttons to the Tile Editor
Max screen dimension is now 640px
You can now rotate tiles in 90 degree increments in the engine
You can now add a color from the color picker
Fixed bug that caused Eraser to not work in the Tilemap Editor depending on the Tile tool selected
Tile and Tilemap data is now compressed
Fixed bug where selections were not being shown correctly in the tile selector
Fixed bug where tiles in tall tilemaps were not able to be drawn
Added Selection tool to Tile Editor
Added Move tool to Tile Editor
Added copy, cut, and paste to Tile Editor
Fixed bug where tile not of size 16 were not rendering
Changed code editor linting settings
Added time properties to Engine API docs
Added changelog
Added welcome demo
Added time properties to Engine
Heavier borders at tile edges in the tile editor
Fixed pointer input bugs
Improved layout for smaller screens
Show api list by default in code editor
